abstract: You know how people’s lives are often referred to as journeys? Well, I’ve always thought that comparison was extremely apt. A well-spent life, like an outstanding trip, is made up of unexpected turns, strange encounters and priority-changing experiences.

lead_paragraph: You know how people’s lives are often referred to as journeys? Well, I’ve always thought that comparison was extremely apt. A well-spent life, like an outstanding trip, is made up of unexpected turns, strange encounters and priority-changing experiences.

headline.main: His Most Essential Travel Item: A 6-Year-Old’s Enthusiasm
